DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect hospital-based intensive non-surgical treatment musculoskeletal patient admit integrated hospital offer complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) conventional medicine treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Integrated CAM Treatment Hospitalized Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect hospital-based intensive non-surgical treatment musculoskeletal patient admit integrated hospital offer complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) conventional medicine treatment . Inpatients receive treatment accord CAM treatment protocol ( herbal medicine , acupuncture , bee venom pharmacopuncture , Chuna manipulation ) conventional medicine treatment need . The main outcome measure duration pain , NRS back pain , radiate leg pain , neck pain , radiate arm pain , knee pain , shoulder pain , previous surgery , previous intervention ( injection ) , Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) , Vernon-Mior Neck Disability Index , Korean Western Ontario McMaster Index , Shoulder Pain Disability Index , range motion ( ROM ) , Straight leg raise test ( SLR ) , alcohol use , smoking , exercise admission , 2 week , discharge .
DOC.criteria: Patients hospitalize due spine joint disease Main complaint back pain , radiate leg pain , neck pain , radiate arm pain , knee pain shoulder pain Cause pain nonrelated spine , joint soft tissue ; example , spinal tumor , pregnancy , urolithiasis , etc . Refusal provide information need clinical research
